Description.p: The abc account uses a password of "test". This would allow anyone to log into the machine via SSH and take complete control of the system.

Solution.summary: Fix Default SSH account: abc password "test"

workaround.p: Use the "passwd" command to set a more secure login password. A good password should consist of a mix of lower- and upper-case characters, numbers, and punctuation and should be at least 8 characters long.
